mapper.select: SELECT un.* ,u.user_id ,u.username FROM (SELECT p.inventor_id ,p.inventor_name,p.inventor_id_number,p.inventor_nationality ,p.inventor_mobile ,p.inventor_email,p.inventor_attachment_file, p.inventor_other_information FROM common_inventor p WHERE inventor_id IN (SELECT inventor FROM user_inventor WHERE USER =#{userId}) ORDER BY create_time DESC limit #{startIndex}, #{pageSize} ) AS un JOIN user_inventor up ON un.inventor_id = up.inventor JOIN users u ON up.user = u.user_id
